news.title: Live Report: Robbie Williams crowns himself "king of entertainment" at relentlessly thrilling Croke Park show
news.summary: Legendary English pop singer Robbie Williams treated Croke Park to a unrelentingly exhilarating show without a moment of lull on Saturday night, bursting with cheeky banter, impressive choreography, iconic discography and plenty of surprises sprinkled throughout.

news.title: Softdrink Millionnaire plus friends to play Gig 4 Gaza at Whelan's
news.summary: 100% of the ticket sales will go directly to funding relief in Gaza

news.title: Woody Allen faces backlash following participation in Moscow International Film Week
news.summary: The filmmaker took part in a Q&A session moderated by pro-Putin Russian director Fyodor Bondarchuk.

news.title: Lorne Michaels says he would have invited Sinéad O’Connor to SNL50 celebration
news.summary: The SNL creator had hoped for the singer to perform prior to her death

news.title: The Smiths' drummer Mike Joyce announces memoir
news.summary: The memoir will "re-contextualise fan favourite moments through a beautifully vulnerable, human insight into his life"

news.title: KNEECAP cancel upcoming U.S. tour dates due to time conflict with Mo Chara hearing
news.summary: KNEECAP said they were forced to cancel the dates "due to the close proximity of our next court hearing in London on September 26 – as the British government continues its witch-hunt – with the start of the U.S. tour."

news.title: Live Report: Folk Bitch Trio showed off their melancholy style with a captivating Whelan's gig
news.summary: Performing at Whelan's upstairs venue, Folk Bitch Trio gave boygenius a run for their money.

news.title: Five journalists among 20 killed in Israeli strikes on hospital
news.summary: Five journalists and four medical workers are among the 20 people killed in double-tap strikes on the hospital. At least 50 others were injured, including critically ill patients who were being treated in the hospital.

news.title: Electric Picnic 2025 stage times announced
news.summary: The countdown is on for Electric Picnic 2025! Find information on when and where your favourite musicians are playing below.

news.title: Special benefit performance of The Weir announced in honour of Seán Rocks and St. Francis Hospice
news.summary: Tickets go on sale tomorrow morning
